data.title: Turner H. Sothoron
data.meta_description: Meet our team, Turner H. Sothoron, from McGowan & Cecil, LLC. Contact us today!
data.text:
Partner

Turner H. Sothoron was born and raised in Upper Marlboro, Maryland and now resides with his family in Annapolis. He earned his Bachelor's degree in Corporate Communications from Elon University in North Carolina in 2006 and received his Juris Doctorate from North Carolina Central University in Durham, North Carolina.

After graduating law school in May of 2011, he worked as a law clerk to two Prince George's County Circuit Court judges, the Honorable Maureen M. Lamasney and the Honorable Crystal D. Mittelstaedt. Since then, Turner has advocated for hundreds of personal injury victims, handling a wide range of automobile, worker's compensation, and social security disability cases.

He is an active member of the Prince George's County Bar Association and serves as the Prince George's County Circuit Representative for the Young Lawyers Section of the Maryland State Bar Association.
